html:
3.29.25  9:43 am   you know how y2k happened in the year 2000, do you think y3k will happen in the year 3000? what about y4k?

      if you're asking me if the year 3000 will happen in the year 3000 ...............

3.29.25  9:18 am   favorite exercise?

      flexing

3.29.25  8:27 am   If I love someone with all my heart, why is it still not enough to fix my fundamentally flawed nature?

      maybe your nature is not flawed and that's why you're not seeing anything get fixed. that would technically explain the problem

3.29.25  7:46 am   can you be in two or three places at once

      what makes this possible is the different ways to define a place. i once met a person who claimed to be in europe, france, and paris, all at the same time

3.29.25  6:52 am   is the word 'green' a good surname?

     it's pretty good. maybe the worst thing about it is that it's so common. but everything else about it seems pretty good

     if you like the word green, does that make you a narssisist?

     no

3.29.25  3:28 am   is there a music olympics?

      maybe if anyone knew what the exact objective is

3.29.25  3:26 am   If some animals are poisonous how can they be part of the food chain 

      i'm not sure

3.29.25  3:17 am   do you have a favorite Bollywood song? 

      no

3.29.25  1:37 am   could you, perchance, tell us your thoughts about the word "perchance"?

      it's a little old fashioned but that's ok

3.29.25  1:28 am   i sort of 'like' thinking. about a lot of things. as many do. but sometimes thinking about the universe as a whole gives me existential dread. it makes me feel like anything i do, everything i live for means nothing cause we're all just gonna die. I think i can only describe it as melancholy?

      dammit, who has been going around telling everyone the universe as a whole is melancholy

3.28.25  11:57 pm   thoughts on life?

      "it's alive!"

3.28.25  9:04 pm   Any controversial opinions?

      all opinions are controversial. if it's not controversial, it's not an opinion. this is not an opinion by the way, it's just true (in my opinion)

3.28.25  9:03 pm   what is your favorite number higher than 10,000?

      10,001

3.28.25  7:22 pm   Is the evolution of language and writing driven by persistent, specific mistakes?

      it's driven by communication. mistakes may happen, but the drive is to communicate despite this

3.28.25  6:29 pm   what if I don't want to learn about my world?  what if I want to live under a rock and remain uninfluenced

      give it a try, but the world is everywhere. including there

3.28.25  5:36 pm   whats your favorite little creature?

      how about a photon

3.28.25  5:29 pm   Thoughts on the Marvel/DC movies, or just superhero movies in general?

      i heard they're thinkin of doing another one

3.28.25  4:21 pm   do you believe in reincarnation

      yes but it's over an infinite period of time. which might make it a considerably different phenomenon from what people might normally think of when they say 'reincarnation'

3.28.25  2:38 pm   what if i want to make tar instead of art

      that's fine with me

3.28.25  1:55 pm   in the event that a musical artist comes out to be a terrible person, is it still morally defensible to listen to their music? can we separate the art from the artist to have our cake and eat it too?

      it really just depends on which judge you get that day

3.28.25  1:32 pm   quantum superposition?

      seems pretty chill

3.28.25  12:40 pm   Thoughts on thoughts?

      maybe it's time to go outside

3.28.25  11:46 am   Why is true showing of love reserved only for special occasions?

      i thought it was the fake ones that were reserved and scheduled, and the real ones that come along by surprise

3.28.25  10:58 am   why is the space bar so large

      because it's awsome

3.28.25  10:38 am   what is your favorite date

      january 1

3.28.25  10:21 am   your dedication inspires me

      your inspiration dedicates me

3.28.25  10:08 am   what do you consider noble?

      can't say. nobleness is corrupted instantly by the glory of the concept of nobleness. and so actual nobleness needs to be technically kept secret

3.28.25  10:00 am   do you like to wear soft clothing cause it makes you feel like you're rough in comparison?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.28.25  9:10 am   how's the weather?

      insatiable

3.28.25  5:59 am   i love to procrastinate because i like going through the extreme highs and lows of multiple different emotions constantly. there's something i need to do i ignore it for 2 and a half weeks i feel so chill and cool doing whatever i want for that time. the deadline approaches and i stress out MAJORLY bc im now gonna have to do 3 weeks worth of work in 2 or 3 days. feel like a machine working on the thing all day long for those couple of days. deadline comes i turn in the thing for feedback. the feedback says wow this is so good you did really well. i'm on cloud 9.  repeat.  i always say an able man is never busy i think it really rings true

      definitely a viable technique, to confine the assignment to a limited segment of time at the end of the period. i've employed this technique, actually to free up time to do other projects

3.28.25  5:22 am   You know when you create something and you're super excited about it and you're proud and you send it to someone only to calm down after a few minutes and realize you shouldn't have sent it to them?

      sure, that could happen

3.28.25  5:02 am   thoughts on mirrors?

      hard to draw

3.28.25  2:17 am   How did the chicken cross the road?

      on the crosswalk, after pressing the button and waiting for the lights to change

3.28.25  1:48 am   have you ever thought about formatting the date and time on the questions page like year-month-day hour-minute, with time being in the 24 hour format?

      no, but i use that format for other things

3.28.25  12:17 am   what if it turns out that everything is magic, and nobody was ever wrong? 

      what's most magical to me is when things are both wrong and write, sorry typo

3.27.25  11:36 pm   What did you put into "It's gonna be alright" to make it instantly soothe anxiety? How did you do that?

      by believing it

3.27.25  11:31 pm   are you hip with the fresh new slang?

      i like to land on language that's gonna last a long time. if i need some temporary fresh swirls, heavens sakes i can make up my own. or borrow ones from 120 years ago, heck,

3.27.25  11:21 pm   How do those tiny clown cars fit so many clowns in them?

      they take everything else out of the car. the car has no seats, no dividers, take out the engine and steering wheel if you have to. so you can fit more clowns in

3.27.25  11:10 pm   whats the best language

      all languages are equally good

3.27.25  9:42 pm   how to know when it's time to stop chasing the ideal thing and start compromising? cuz if you try all your life and fail, nothing is done. but if you compromise too soon it feels half-assed. i haven't really made that made me go ok this is decent and was done in a reasonable timeframe

      amidst all the wondering and worrying, you will actually do things at quite reasonable times

3.27.25  9:05 pm   Should I clean my room? I feel like it bothers me but I'm too lazy to do anything about it.

      maybe for perspective you could clean someone else's room

3.27.25  6:51 pm   how many different animation software do you use/have you used

      100

3.27.25  6:48 pm   Do you have any opinions on optimistic nihilism?

      that's gotta be a pyramid scheme

3.27.25  6:45 pm   have you ever made or thought of making a completely new invention

      of course

3.27.25  6:28 pm   hey bill, how do i draw a line? every time i try i just draw a perfect circle instead. very frustrating.

      maybe you could make an arrangement with a person who can draw lines but not circles

3.27.25  6:26 pm   what are your thoughts on thoughts? never know if i'm thinking or not. hm

      this is usually about when i think, 'would be great to be doing stuff'

3.27.25  5:17 pm   how can i know if my question was answered?

      it is

3.27.25  5:06 pm   when was art invented

      whenever you get around to doing it

3.27.25  5:06 pm   When is it?

      Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 9:28:09 PM

3.27.25  5:03 pm   Thoughts on tricks?

      the concept of tricks sounds all good and fun, but in an actual situation i can see why it may not always seem so convenient
